Acabo de adquirir la antología de Half Life 1. Y que decir que no se sepa ya. Que a este precio tan ridículo tengas para jugar muchas horas, y encima de una obra legendaria en donde las haya, es de agradecer. Un gustazo!
The game that everyone knows about and everyone has played it. If you never played the game, what are you waiting for?
Пример который показывает игры того времени. Сама игра ничем не принужденная и хорошо проработана. DM в игре до сих пор популярен ( Да?)
sooo.. i figured i should give a positive rewiew cause i have 366 hours of gameplay without noticing
I get nostalgic everytime i start IT. Its Just a great Game.

I po všech těch letech tahle hra pořád žije. Skvělá grafika, skvělý gameplay, skvělá prostředí, skvělá atmosféra. Nemám co téhle hře vytknout. Soundtracku je málo, ale to nevadí, protože se i tak královsky pobavíte.
FINÁLNÍ VERDIKT: 10/10 MASTAPEECE.

Honestly This is just amazing I literally couldnt stop playing, the characters the story and the goofy doctors who are scared of the slightest gun shot then run into an alien yes my favorite! I love this game to death!

The first part of the legendary "half life" series is more than a regular game. As well as "CS 1.6" I got acquainted with this game from an early age and with pleasure spent hundreds of hours flying. Over the past 20 years, a lot of good games with their own unique mechanics and gameplay have come out, but none of them have been able to surpass in "CS 1.6" and "Half life". The good news is that both of these games are still full of players and even at night you can find a server and hack to death like the good old ones.
very good game, some glitches but pog
Это лучшая игра которая заставляет вспомнить с чего все начиналось.
Juego super divertido con una historia fascinante. Este debería ser el primer juego de los niños de ahora, no juegos como Fornite o Minecraft.

It's Half-Life, widely considered the greatest PC game ever made. There are other strong contenders (including its own sequel), but it certainly is a fantastic game and possibly the greatest debut by any developer ever.
